author: Erin Breaux
comment: Amazingly customizable!!!!! Even the limited ones you have full choice of the colors given. I wanna buy all these watch faces now

author: Oscar Lewis
comment: Great and beautiful designs. I really want to use the owl design but when I'm listening to music the card with the artist and play/pause button comes up higher on the watchface (and coversn up the time) then it does on the other watch faces. A fix to this would be greatly appreciated!

author: Victor Carias
comment: Awesome watch faces. Really hoping for an update with more illustrations. I'd love to see an otter in one. Or any other nice images.

author: Patricio Diaz
comment: Nice! But could you add more setting like more colors and settings? Thanks!
Fantastic faces! Very customizable and fun! Very happy with this purchase. :)

author: Ivan Encarnation
comment: Simple and elegant
title: Amazing

author: Christopher Graham
comment: Best

author: Drew Rushmer
comment: Deceptively simple designs that combine s fantastic design aesthetic with the functions you need.  Not only that, but the color palette is up to you and very customizable - should one so desire, one could keep the same watch face but change the palette to fit that day's outfit!  Great stuff from a great developer who is not only open to feedback, but who even pounces on reported issues like a tiger on a T-bone.
title: Form meets function and they fall in love

author: Ian Tang
comment: These watch faces are simple and fun, but you can see the detail and time spent creating them. It'll turn any watch into something that represents your animal side.
title: Beautiful and thoughtful!

author: Art Vandelay
comment: I'd love to have a colour selector for the octopus watch face to allow colours other than orange and green, and also the option to remove the battery level. Aside from that, very good.

author: Tanvir Talukder
comment: These are my favorite set of watch faces in the store. They look cool, have great art, and have a variety of options on how you want the time presented. I wish the developer would actually add more watch faces. Would love to see more concepts and designs.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content:
Hi Tanvir!
Thanks for the kind words! We are actually working on several new watch faces, so keep an eye out!

title: Some of the best looking watchfaces in Play store

author: Robert Walldén
comment: With the other watch faces I've bought, I receive regular updates with refinements and added watch faces. This was apparently a one-off. Can't recommend it.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content:
Hi Robert,
We just released an update for this, which includes a new face. Hopefully you like the new designs and features.

author: PossessedAlpha
comment: I brought this and it hasnt been installed onto my phone or the app. What do I need to do to put it on??

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Tania - this isn't for a phone, it's for a smart watch. Have you been able to bring the faces up via the Android Wear app on your phone? If not, try un-installing and re-installing it, that should work. Let us know if it's still giving you trouble!

title: Not on phone

author: Zachary Moses
comment: I love the style of the octopus watch face, though I'd like to have a wider color selection. Overall though, one of my favorite faces.
title: More colors

author: Lloyd Lentz
comment: Great watch face,  my default for the last months.

author: Mych
comment: Amazing work - well worth spending the money if not more!! Can't wait for what might come next from V!!
title: Amazing work

author: Jeremy Feltman
comment: Great work. Owl watchface looks awesome on my Moto360.

author: Lou Wolford
comment: All of the faces look so freaking cool!
title: Awesome

author: Daqwan Koenig
comment: Who doesn't want a Octopus watch face
title: It's a Octopus

author: Kimberlin Detz
comment: I love owls and octopus so this had the besttttt choices. Won my heart💜
title: Beautiful

author: Chris Haines
comment: Bought this just for the orange face with the octopus. I'd love love a brighter orange, though.
title: Solid

author: Jill Gundaker
comment: Really great illustrations!
title: Amazing

author: John
comment: Love the octopus, worth the purchase for this one face alone.
title: Octopus

author: Saeryn Wilcoxen
comment: Great design and style, perfect addition to my 360!
title: Perfect

author: May Jl
comment: Work well on moto360, thanks for checking

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hello. Sometimes it can take a little time for the watch face to completely install. Did you have any luck?

title: Yes it works now

author: Dan Buckland
comment: Beautiful illustrations with Lovely Details

author: Aaron Berlin
comment: These are gorgeous! Thanks for fixing ambient mode on the SW3!

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Aaron! We just released an update that should fix your ambient issues!  Let us know if you have any other comments.

author: Mitch Marriott
comment: Cool

author: Mad Season
comment: Perfect

author: Jason Salas
comment: You get not one, but FOUR amazing watch faces, each of which is different in its visual presentation and how it expresses time. Really well done collection.
title: Aesthetically beautiful, functionally diverse

author: rick sare almost daily vlog
comment: It's going to be hard to replace the incredible Dr Who watch face that fat Russell put out but I think these might do it
title: Love them all

author: Jack Holt
comment: for some new watch faces to spice up my Moto 360 and these fit the bill. The art is great and they look quite classy on my watch.
title: I've been looking

author: Robert T. Best
comment: Finally a watch face that Cthulhu would approve of.
title: Praise Cthulhu

author: Jeanne Sutton
comment: Love that you can customize each watch face to make it a "one of a kind".
title: Make it your own.

author: Kata Crea
comment: Love that you can change the background colors
title: Unique designs

author: David Moralez
comment: Great illustrations work. Love it.
title: Just awesome

author: Brooke Hugus
comment: These watch faces are customizable, quirky and cleanly executed. Great stuff!
title: Aesthetics + Utility

author: Said Tahsin Dane
comment: The illustrations should be there when the watch goes into always on ambient mode. It just shows the digital time for me and the rest is all black.

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Said! Thank you for the feedback :) we're working on some updates for the faces, and appreciate you sharing that!

title: Always on mode

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Colors need to be more customizable

reply.author: Fat Russell
reply.content: Hi Arik! Have you tried using the Andoid App on your phone? You can bring up the watch faces and customize almost all the colors to whatever you like!
